articles.description: From ‘shafted’ to climbing all the way back: Holloway finally caps off Wallabies journey
articles.content:

articles.title: July inflation could shock Argentina's government - economy ministry source
articles.description: In regards to the country's renegotiation of $2 billion in debt with Club of Paris creditor countries, the source said the government would try to reach a debt agreement "as quickly as possible."
articles.content:
Inflation in July could be so high that it will "shock" Argentina's government, an economy ministry source told Reuters on Thursday, expecting high inflation in August as well.

articles.title: Argentina: Markets give tepid welcome to new economy chief
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — The market welcomed Argentina’s new Economy Minister Sergio Massa on Thursday with what appeared to be a cautiously optimistic attitude amid questions about how he would fulfill a key goal of reducing the fiscal deficit, while leftist groups criticized his initial plans that they said would inevitably lead to strong austerity measures.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — The market welcomed Argentina’s new Economy Minister Sergio Massa on Thursday with what appeared to be a cautiously optimistic attitude amid questions about how he would fulfill a key goal of reducing the fiscal deficit... [3880 chars]
